title: Fertility rate in Brazil
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: Overall Number of children born per woman has decreased over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and finally roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Number of children born per woman, about 1.82 was reported at Year 2009
The lowest Number of children born per woman, of value 1.74 was reported at Year 2017
